overview:
Research Chemicals UK LTD are now stocking laboratory tested 99.89% pure Research Chemicals, www.researchchemicals.co.uk understand that in the current economic climate funds can be quite scarce, for this exact reason we are offering discounts of up to 10% on all orders over Â£70 along with a free gift of your choice.

Research Chemicals UK LTD have very strong connections with the worlds top Research Chemical Suppliers, we can guarantee more then 99% purity, if you can find a Research Chemical in our inventory which is less than 99.89% pure we will guarantee your money back.

Any product which is purchased from Research Chemicals UK LTD is strictly not for human consumption, Research Chemicals UK LTD’s products are strictly for Research purposes only, i.e. CAS number referencing and Laboratory research.

Unfortunately Research Chemicals UK LTD does not offer refunds other then in the circumstances mentioned above, and in order to receive your refund send your purity test reports to Research Chemicals UK LTD @ researchchemicalsukltd@gmail.com and we will get back to you on how to refund you.
